00002 * File: BlkGMRESSolver2P.h
00003 * ----------------------
00004 * This is the GMRES sparse matrix solver for block matrix,
00005 * although the kernal function of GMRES are same, the data
00006 * structure are different.
00007 *
00008 * 2P Connection list only!

00010 * Created    01/17/05          yljiang
00011 */
